allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release of MetaBuilder

Full-featured experiment plate metadata builder with AI-assisted layout
generation, multi-plate support, metadata layers, sequence fill, layer
merging, file attachments, and export to 6 formats \(JSON, CSV, XML,
Excel, PowerPoint, PNG\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
